{{cpp/text/text_encoding/title|aliases}}
{{cpp/text/text_encoding/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
constexpr aliases_view aliases() const noexcept;
}}

Returns a non-empty range of type {{rlpt|aliases_view|text_encoding::aliases_view}} containing the aliases of {{c|*this}} if it represents a known registered character encoding. Otherwise, returns an empty range of type {{tt|text_encoding::aliases_view}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A {{lconcept|view}} containing aliases of the known registered character encoding represented by {{c|*this}}; otherwise an empty range.
